definition: To achieve or obtain something through great effort, often in a competitive context. It is commonly used to describe the act of winning or gaining victory, typically in sports, competitions, or battles.

examples.english: She was able to achieve victory.

examples.german: Er hat den ersten Platz errungen.
Die Mannschaft konnte den Titel erringen.
examples.english: The team was able to win the title.

examples.german: Es ist schwierig, den Respekt anderer zu erringen.
examples.english: It is difficult to earn the respect of others.

examples.german: Er versuchte, ihre Liebe zu erringen.
examples.english: He tried to win her love.
